title: League client won't open
body: I click the application, patcher loads, click launch and it waits for a second, then gives me the option to click launch again. It's been doing this for 3 days. When I was on the new client it would just bring up the league icon with the loading screen but it would never get to the login.

replies.body: same too i reinstalled and uninstalled a bunch of times and its bad enough i have to play on mac after i just bought a bunch of champs and skins{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

Damn, I'm sorry to hear you haven't been able to get past the patcher for days now. The specific behavior you're seeing is pretty common when there's an issue keeping a solid connection to our servers. You should be able to resolve this after configuring your network settings according to our [**connection guide.**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Should you still experience these symptoms after working through that guide, let me know!
My friend is still having issues, he tried reinstalling, using the hextech repair tool and so forth. His ign is Dromoka99 on the NA server. How should I have him contact you?

I'd actually recommend he make his own post if he's having issues. It will be much easier to address his issue if he provides more context as to what's going on and what he's already specifically tried. ^.^

This issue happened to me today, I restarted my computer and I still had an issue, so I reinstalled the client and everything is working fine now. I know it might not be a quick fix but it is what worked for me.
I just reinstalled last night and it didn't fix it
My buddy can't get in either, update me if you guys hear anything.
Mine won't boot only for the past 10 mins anyone know what's up?
